full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title: Development of Two eLearning Courses in the SCBO Core Curriculum
Development of two eLearning courses in the SCBO Core Curriculum.

### Tender Details
* **Tender Reference:** PW-22-01013004
* **Solicitation Number:** 100022387
* **Publication Date:** November 9, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 5, 2022 (2:00 PM EST)
* **Contract Start Date:** TBA (dependent on tender evaluation)
* **Contract End Date:** TBA (dependent on contract duration)

### Description
The Government of Canada is seeking proposals to develop two eLearning courses on the SCBO Core Curriculum. The proposed courses should be designed for End-to-End Learning Services and meet the requirements outlined in the attached document.

### Tender Evaluation Criteria
This tender will be evaluated based on the requirements outlined in the attached document.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or requests for clarification, please contact:
* **Name:** Michelle Pauzé
* **Email:** Michelle.Pauze@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
* **Address:** 140 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, QC, J8X 2K2, Canada

### Attachments
The tender documents, including the terms of reference, are available for downloading at the following URL:
* **English:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/09/eb35e490148a8a51cae464a1de24eb1a/npp-en.docx
* **French:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/09/adb177db3704441fa9e6c9540711c3cd/100022387-apm.docx

### Contract Value
The estimated value of this contract is not disclosed.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Region of Opportunity
This tender is open to proponents from across Canada.
